name: Mein Sheep
description:
The evil sheep are plotting against you, but with your target pointer and the trusty guards, they won't know what hit them! Well they definitely will, because what hit them is their wooly companions!

Use LMB to shoot RELAX darts (or blue, whatever you want to call them!) and RMB to shoot RAGE darts (reeeed!) at sheep and make sure your targets are terminated... or we might just have to terminate all of them.

Super awesome and pretty 1280x720 builds behind the standalone links.

Code by https://twitter.com/RootLlama
Art by https://twitter.com/Detocroix

Music "Spazzmatica Polka"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

p.s. The "gold sheep" is actually called as Nugget, but we agreed to disagree with RootLlama

Ludum Dare 32 entry.
